title: Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou Specials
synopsis: The original gag comedy manga follows the humorous yet "realistic" everyday life of Tadakuni, Hidenori, Yoshitake, and other students at a boys' high school.
characters: ['Tabata, Hidenori', 'Tanaka, Yoshitake', 'Tadakuni', 'Ringo', 'Motoharu', 'Vice President', 'President', 'Mitsuo', 'Overly Self-conscious Girl', "Takahiro's Friend"]
voices: ['Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Suzumura, Kenichi', 'Irino, Miyu', 'Yuuki, Aoi', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Yasumoto, Hiroki', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Okamoto, Nobuhiko', 'Ikezawa, Haruna', 'Suwabe, Junichi']
